did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: Roadmap to an Artscene: An introduction to artists from Flanders, Belgium, 2005.
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: CD-ROM and pamphlet documenting the work of Flemish artists. Also includes written articles, art works, pictures, biographical information and links to additional information.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: CD-ROM and pamphlet documenting the work of Flemish artists. Also includes written articles, art works, pictures, biographical information and links to additional information. Also outlines the Flemish art scene, major museums, art centers and other organizations.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: Rose Goldsen Archive of New Media Art.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: Digital files may not be copied or downloaded without the permission of the Curator or artist(s).

phystech.head: Physical Characteristics and Technical Requirements:
phystech.p: System requirements for disc: CD-ROM drive.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Roadmap to an Artscene: An Introduction to Artists From Flanders, Belgium, #8207. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
